capability.name: Market Research
capability.definition: This service domain handles the capture of market research from multiple external sources. This can include live feeds, analysis and reports in any form. The information is classified/catalogued and stored for retrieval.
capability.role: This service domain supports general market research for a wide range of uses and sources - including customer and competitor activity and related market assessments. It can combine subscribing to and consolidating market research with supporting on-line/interactive access to market news sources (general, not financial market). A more sophisticated implementation will support specific market information requests and the consolidation of gathered intelligence
capability.example: A market research department handles the access and consolidation and classification of market research

key_features.name: Identify and subscribe to market resource services
key_features.description: Enables identify and subscribe to market resource services to support this service domain handles the capture of market research from multiple external sources
